actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to convey certain lands in Dinosaur National Monument, Colorado to the heirs of Charles T. Mantle, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to exchange specified lands with the heirs of Charles T. Mantle. Makes such lands acquired by the Secretary part of the Dinosaur National Monument, Colorado.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain lands in Dinosaur National Monument, Colorado to the heirs of Charles T. Mantle, and for other purposes.
